DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Immunosuppressive Therapy Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/no response to information relating to prior immunosuppressive therapy (therapy used to decrease the body's immune response, such as drugs given to prevent transplant rejection) received by the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to prior immunosuppressive therapy (therapy used to decrease the body's immune response, such as drugs given to prevent transplant rejection) received by the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:deliberate suppression of immune system function for experimental or therapeutic purposes.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: deliberate suppression of immune system function for experimental or therapeutic purposes.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: SWOG CRF:Southwest Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received any immu
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any immunosuppressive medications (excluding intranasal/inhaled corticosteroids, or systemic corticosteroids <= 10 mg/day)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received any immunosuppressive medications (excluding intranasal/inhaled corticosteroids, or systemic corticosteroids <= 10 mg/day) since discontinuing MEDI4736?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any immunosuppressive medications (excluding intranasal/inhaled corticosteroids, or systemic corticosteroids <= 10 mg/day) since discontinuing MEDI4736?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days before registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days before the first dose of durvalumab (with the exception of those allowed in section 3.3 of the protocol)

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days before registration (with the exception of those allowed in section 3.2 of the protocol)
